title: Has anyone heard of Suraasa??
selftext:
[Suraasa](https://www.suraasa.com/) is a company that provides courses for teachers and claims to give opportunities to go abroad. 
My cousin is thinking of doing their certification.  
Has anyone heard of this or have had any experience with them?  
I am not able to find out how genuine this is or is it just another EdTech scam. 
Please help.  
Thank You!
